ObjectClass.Name: Subspace Amplifier Relay
ObjectClass.Description:
SUBSPACE AMPLIFIER:
Secure 12 Supremacy Points at any point in the past to claim victory Makes resources at full control: + 30 QP, P / 60s continuously + 30 QP, LC at 180 s intervals while cores remain

Objective.Name: vendor_idle
Objective.Details: makes unit change its allegiances as-becomes convenient for it

Objective.Name: Chrono-Disruptor
Objective.Details: Sacrifice this Amplifier Relay to \indefinitely Freeze or TSS-Break a single \target \ \(Can be used to disable enemy Amplifiers)

ObjectClass.Name: Damaged Relay
ObjectClass.Description:
SUBSPACE AMPLIFIER:
Repair to restore resource generation and Supremacy functions
